# HeliosHash DAO Pull Request

## Summary
Explain the change, purpose, and related issue(s).

## Checklist
- [ ] Follows HHDAO code style & patterns
- [ ] No console logs / debug noise
- [ ] Types validated (`pnpm type-check`)
- [ ] Lint passed (`pnpm lint`)
- [ ] Web builds (`pnpm build`)
- [ ] Canisters build (`dfx build`)
- [ ] Added tests or not required

## Impact Area
- [ ] Web / UI
- [ ] Auth / Identity
- [ ] Canisters (Motoko)
- [ ] DAO / Governance
- [ ] Infra / CI-DX

## Reviewer Notes
Anything important for reviewers before approving.

## Approvals
Requires **2+ approvals** from `CODEOWNERS`.
